title: Jhin & Warlords bloodlust
body:
I've just played a game as jhin and what i've noticed that his 4th auto the massive critical some how i have no clue how I've spent the past 15 mins trying to find info on either his passive or q and it says nothing but being able to reset the timer for his 4th auto before he starts reloading. is this not told on the description of his passive or is this a bug?

And with the change to warlord's bloodlust with the life steal is it able to give the life steal part how your lower hp to show up onto your Lifesteal stats in game so it shows how much life steal you are getting or have a passive or something to show the life steal cause i honestly don't noticed it healing or anything…
